sub_topic: Calculation of thermodynamic properties of a mixture.
message_1: Calculate the specific enthalpy and entropy of a mixture of 1 kg of water and 0.5 kg of ethanol at a temperature of 300 K and a pressure of 1 atm. Given the enthalpy and entropy values of water and ethanol at the same temperature and pressure.
message_2: To calculate the specific enthalpy and entropy of the mixture, we need the enthalpy and entropy values of water and ethanol at 300 K and 1 atm. Please provide these values.
